ayas.arabic: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا
ayas.translation: By the scattering [winds] that scatter [the clouds];
ayas.transliteration: wadh dhāriyāti dharwā

bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

ayas.arabic: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا
ayas.translation: by the [rain] bearing [clouds] laden [with water];
ayas.transliteration: fal ḥāmilāti wiqrā

ayas.arabic: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا
ayas.translation: by [the ships] which move gently [on the sea];
ayas.transliteration: fal jāriyāti yusrā

ayas.arabic: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا
ayas.translation: by [the angels] who dispense [livelihood] by [His] command:
ayas.transliteration: fal muqassimāti amrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
ayas.translation: indeed what you are promised is true,
ayas.transliteration: innamā tū`adūna laṣādiq

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
ayas.translation: and indeed the retribution will surely come to pass!
ayas.transliteration: wa innad dīna lawāqi`

ayas.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ
ayas.translation: By the sky full of adornment [with stars],
ayas.transliteration: was samā-i dhātil ḥubuk

ayas.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
ayas.translation: indeed you are of different opinions!
ayas.transliteration: innakum lafī qawlin mukhtalif

ayas.arabic: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
ayas.translation: He who has been turned away [from the truth] is turned away from it.
ayas.transliteration: yu-faku `anhu man ufik

ayas.arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ
ayas.translation: Perish the liars,
ayas.transliteration: qutilal-kharrāṣūn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
ayas.translation: who are heedless in a stupor!
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna hum fī ghamratin sāhūn

ayas.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayas.translation: They ask, ‘When will be the Day of Retribution?’
ayas.transliteration: yas-alūna ayyāna yawmud dīn

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
ayas.translation: It is the day when they will be tormented in the Fire,
ayas.transliteration: yawma hum `alan nāri yuftanūn

ayas.arabic: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
ayas.translation: [and will be told]: ‘Taste your torment. This is what you used to hasten.’
ayas.transliteration: dhūqū fitnatakum hādhal ladhī kuntum bihi tasta`jilūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
ayas.translation: Indeed the Godwary will be amid gardens and springs,
ayas.transliteration: innal muttaqīna fī jannātin wa`uyūn

ayas.arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
ayas.translation: receiving what their Lord has given them, for they had been virtuous aforetime.
ayas.transliteration: ākhidhīna mā ātāhum rabbuhum ۚ innahum kānū qabla dhālika muḥsinīn

ayas.arabic: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: They used to sleep a little during the night,
ayas.transliteration: kānū qalīlan minal layli mā yahja`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: and at dawns they would plead for forgiveness,
ayas.transliteration: wabil-as-ḥāri hum yastaghfirūn

ayas.arabic: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
ayas.translation: and there was a share in their wealth for the beggar and the deprived.
ayas.transliteration: wafī amwālihim ḥaqqul lissā-ili wal maḥrūm

ayas.arabic: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
ayas.translation: In the earth are signs for those who have conviction,
ayas.transliteration: wafil-arḍi āyātul lil-mūqinīn

ayas.arabic: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: and in your souls [as well]. Will you not then perceive?
ayas.transliteration: wafī anfusikum ۚ afalā tubṣirūn

ayas.arabic: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: And in the sky is your provision and what you are promised.
ayas.transliteration: wafis samā-i rizqukum wa mā tū`adūn

ayas.arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
ayas.translation: By the Lord of the sky and the earth, it is indeed the truth, just as [it is a fact that] you speak.
ayas.transliteration: fawarabbis samā-i wal-arḍi innahu laḥaqqun mithla mā annakum tanṭiqūn

ayas.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
ayas.translation: Did you receive the story of Abraham’s honoured guests?
ayas.transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīthu ḍayfi ibrāhīmal mukramīn

ayas.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
ayas.translation: When they entered into his presence, they said, ‘Peace!’ ‘Peace!’ He answered, ‘[You are] an unfamiliar folk.’
ayas.transliteration: idh dakhalū `alayhi faqālū salāmā ۖ qāla salāmun qawmun munkarūn

ayas.arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
ayas.translation: Then he retired to his family and brought a fat [roasted] calf,
ayas.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajā-a bi`ijlin samīn

ayas.arabic: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
ayas.translation: and put it near them. He said, ‘Will you not eat?’
ayas.transliteration: faqarrabahu ilayhim qāla alā ta-kulūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Then he felt a fear of them. They said, ‘Do not be afraid!’ and they gave him the good news of a wise son.
ayas.transliteration: fa-awjasa minhum khīfah ۖ qālū lā takhaf ۖ wabashharūhu bighulāmin `alīm

ayas.arabic: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Then his wife came forward crying [with joy]. She beat her face, and said, ‘A barren old woman!’
ayas.transliteration: fa-aqbalatim-ra-atuhu fī ṣarratin faṣakkat wajhahā waqālat `ajūzun `aqīm

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayas.translation: They said, ‘So has your Lord said. Indeed He is the All-wise, the All-knowing.’
ayas.transliteration: qālū kadhāliki qāla rabbuk ۖ innahu huwal ḥakīmul `alīm

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayas.translation: He said, ‘O messengers, what is now your errand?’
ayas.transliteration: qāla famā khaṭbukum ayyuhal mursalūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
ayas.translation: They said, ‘We have been sent toward a guilty people,
ayas.transliteration: qālū innā ursilnā ilā qawmin mujrimīn

ayas.arabic: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
ayas.translation: that We may rain upon them stones of clay,
ayas.transliteration: linursila `alayhim ḥijāratan min ṭīn

ayas.arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
ayas.translation: sent for the transgressors from your Lord.
ayas.transliteration: musawwamatan `inda rabbika lil-musrifīn

ayas.arabic: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: So We picked out those who were in it of the faithful,
ayas.transliteration: fa-akhrajnā man kāna fīhā minal mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: but We did not find there other than one house of Muslims,
ayas.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin minal muslimīn

ayas.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
ayas.translation: and We have left therein a sign for those who fear a painful punishment.’
ayas.transliteration: wataraknā fīhā āyatan lilladhīna yakhāfūnal `adhābal-alīm

ayas.arabic: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: And in Moses [too there is a sign] when We sent him to Pharaoh with a manifest authority.
ayas.transliteration: wafī mūsā idh arsalnāhu ilā fir`awna bisulṭānin mubīn

ayas.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
ayas.translation: But he turned away assured of his might, and said, ‘A magician or a crazy man!’
ayas.transliteration: fatawallā biruknihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: So We seized him and his hosts, and cast them into the sea, while he was blameworthy.
ayas.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fil yammi wahuwa mulīm

ayas.arabic: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
ayas.translation: And in ‘Ad when We unleashed upon them a barren wind.
ayas.transliteration: wafī `ādin idh arsalnā `alayhimur rīḥal `aqīm

ayas.arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
ayas.translation: It left nothing that it came upon without making it like decayed bones.
ayas.transliteration: mā tadharu min shay-in atat `alayhi illā ja`alat-hu kar ramīm

ayas.arabic: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
ayas.translation: And in Thamud, when they were told, ‘Enjoy for a while.’
ayas.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamatta`ū ḥattā ḥīn

ayas.arabic: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
ayas.translation: Then they defied the command of their Lord; so the thunderbolt seized them as they looked on.
ayas.transliteration: fa`ataw `an amri rabbihim fa-akhadhat-humuṣ ṣā`iqatu wahum yanẓurūn

ayas.arabic: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
ayas.translation: So they were neither able to rise up, nor to come to one another’s aid.
ayas.transliteration: famas-taṭā`ū min qiyāmin wa mā kānū muntaṣirīn

ayas.arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
ayas.translation: And the people of Noah aforetime. Indeed, they were a transgressing lot.
ayas.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qabl ۖ innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
ayas.translation: We have built the heaven with might, and indeed it is We who are its expanders.
ayas.transliteration: was samā-a banaynāhā bi-aydin wa innā lamūsi`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
ayas.translation: And We have spread out the earth, so how excellent spreaders We have been!
ayas.transliteration: wal-arḍa farashnāhā fani`mal māhidūn

ayas.arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: In all things We have created pairs so that you may take admonition.
ayas.transliteration: wa min kulli shay-in khalaqnā zawjayni la`allakum tadhakkarūn

ayas.arabic: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: ‘So flee toward Allah. Indeed, I am from Him a manifest warner to you.
ayas.transliteration: fafirrū ilallāh ۖ innī lakum minhu nadhīrun mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: Do not set up another god besides Allah. Indeed I am from Him a manifest warner to you.’
ayas.transliteration: walā taj`alū ma`allāhi ilāhan ākhar ۖ innī lakum minhu nadhīrun mubīn

ayas.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
ayas.translation: So it was that there did not come any apostle to those who were before them but they said, ‘A magician,’ or ‘A crazy man!’
ayas.transliteration: kadhālika mā atal ladhīna min qablihim min rasūlin illā qālū sāḥirun aw majnūn

ayas.arabic: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
ayas.translation: Did they enjoin this upon one another?! Rather, they were a rebellious lot.
ayas.transliteration: atawāṣaw bih ۚ bal hum qawmun ṭāghūn

ayas.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
ayas.translation: So turn away from them, as you will not be blameworthy.
ayas.transliteration: fatawalla `anhum famā anta bimalūm

ayas.arabic: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: And admonish, for admonition indeed benefits the faithful.
ayas.transliteration: wadhakkir fa-innadh dhikrā tanfa`ul mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
ayas.translation: I did not create the jinn and the humans except that they may worship Me.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā khalaqtul jinna wal-insa illā liya`budūn

ayas.arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
ayas.translation: I desire no provision from them, nor do I desire that they should feed Me.
ayas.transliteration: mā urīdu minhum min rizqin wa mā urīdu an yuṭ`imūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
ayas.translation: Indeed it is Allah who is the All-provider, Powerful and All-strong.
ayas.transliteration: innallāha huwar razzāqu dhul quwwatil matīn

ayas.arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
ayas.translation: Indeed the lot of those who do wrong [now] will be like the lot of their [earlier] counterparts. So let them not ask Me to hasten on [that fate].
ayas.transliteration: fa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū dhanūban mithla dhanūbi aṣ-ḥābihim falā yasta`jilūn

ayas.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: Woe to the faithless for the day they are promised!
ayas.transliteration: fawaylul lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimul ladhī yū`adūn
